activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a splash screen and initial launcher for the application. It determines the next activity to launch based on the extras or actions in the intent, such as specific keys (`DAY_CODE`, `EVENT_ID`) or actions (`SHORTCUT_NEW_EVENT`, `SHORTCUT_NEW_TASK`). Depending on the conditions, it starts `MainActivity`, `EventActivity`, or `TaskActivity` with the appropriate extras. If no specific conditions are met, it defaults to starting `MainActivity`. After launching the new activity, it finishes the current `SplashActivity`.

activities.summary: The MainActivity in the SimpleMobileTools Calendar Pro application is the central hub for managing calendar events, including adding birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, and private events. It handles event creation, synchronization with CalDAV, and UI updates. The activity also manages search functionality, event filtering, and navigation between different calendar views such as daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly. It includes features for refreshing events, updating the UI, and handling user interactions like adding new events, tasks, and holidays.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetMonthlyConfigureActivity

dynamic_property.effect: acts as the root layout for the widget configuration activity, coordinating other UI elements.
contains and centers the main configuration UI elements within the activity.
incorporates the calendar configuration fragment into the activity layout.

holds the seekbar for adjusting the background color transparency.
allows users to adjust the transparency level of the widget's background color.
displays the selected text color for the widget configuration.
saves the widget configuration and triggers an update to apply the changes.

activities.summary: The `WidgetMonthlyConfigureActivity` is responsible for configuring the monthly calendar widget. It allows users to customize the widget's appearance, including background color and text color, and updates the widget's UI based on these settings. The activity initializes widget configurations, handles user interactions for color selection, and updates the widget's display using methods like `updateBackgroundColor`, `updateTextColor`, and `updateMonthlyCalendar`. It also saves the configuration and triggers widget updates when changes are made.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetListConfigureActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the main container for the widget configuration UI elements.
holds the main content of the widget configuration UI, centered horizontally with margins.
contains UI elements for selecting the time period for which events should be displayed.
displays a label indicating the purpose of the period picker.
displays the currently selected time period for events.
displays a list of sample events for preview in the widget configuration.
displays the currently selected background color for the widget.
holds the seekbar for adjusting the background transparency of the widget.
allows users to adjust the transparency level of the widget's background color.
displays the currently selected text color for the widget.
saves the current widget configuration and closes the activity.

activities.summary: The `WidgetListConfigureActivity` is responsible for configuring the appearance and behavior of a calendar widget. It allows users to customize the widget's background color, text color, and transparency level. Users can also select the time period for which events should be displayed (e.g., today, next week, next year). The activity includes methods to save these configurations, update the widget dynamically, and display sample events for preview. It also handles color picker dialogs for selecting colors and manages UI updates based on user selections.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetDateConfigureActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for configuring the date widget in the application. It allows users to customize the widget's background color, text color, and transparency. The activity also handles saving the configuration and updating the widget with the new settings.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to display information about the application, including version details, licenses, and links to the developer's website or other related resources.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for customizing the app's appearance and behavior, including setting themes, colors, and other visual preferences.

activities.summary: This activity, `EventActivity`, is primarily used for managing calendar events, including creating, editing, and deleting events. It handles event details such as title, location, description, date and time, reminders, repetition rules, attendees, and event type. The activity also supports features like time zone selection, CalDAV calendar integration, and event color customization.

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing tasks, including creating, editing, duplicating, and deleting tasks. It allows users to set task properties such as title, description, date, time, reminders, repetition rules, event type, and color. The activity also handles task completion status and provides UI updates based on task changes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SelectTimeZoneActivity

provides a container for the toolbar, allowing it to respond to scrolling gestures and other UI interactions.

displays the list of time zones and updates dynamically based on the user's search query.

activities.summary: This activity is used for selecting a time zone. It provides a searchable list of time zones, allowing the user to filter and select a specific time zone. The activity includes a toolbar with a search functionality and a RecyclerView to display the list of time zones. The activity also ensures that the current time zone is highlighted in the list.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

static_properties.text: Use the last events\' reminders as the default for new events
Show events spanning across midnight at the top bar
Start week with the current day
View to open from the event list widget

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity is responsible for managing and configuring various settings in the Simple Mobile Tools Calendar Pro app. It allows users to customize color themes, language, event management, reminders, CalDAV sync, backup settings, and more. The activity provides UI elements to toggle settings, configure defaults, and manage events and tasks.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.ManageEventTypesActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the main container for the activity's UI components.
displays the title 'Manage event types' and contains a menu for adding new event types.
lists all event types and allows users to interact with them (e.g., click to edit).

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing event types within the calendar application. It allows users to view, add, edit, and delete event types. The activity includes functionality to fetch event types, display them in a list, and handle interactions such as clicking on an event type to edit it or deleting event types. It also ensures proper synchronization with CalDAV calendars when necessary.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SnoozeReminderActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for handling snooze reminders. It initializes a dialog for the user to pick a snooze time. If confirmed, it updates the snooze time in the configuration, reschedules the reminder, and finishes the activity. If the dialog is cancelled, it finishes the activity without any transition animation.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.EventTypePickerActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for selecting event or task types. It displays a list of options through a RadioGroupDialog. Upon selecting an option, it launches a new event or task intent and finishes the current activity. If the dialog is cancelled, the activity is also finished.
